title: President Alvi felicitates on Sindhi Culture Day
content:
ISLAMABAD, Dec 5 (APP): President Dr. Arif Alvi Sunday extended felicitations on celebrations of Sindhi Culture Day.
In a tweet on social media platform Twitter, he said, “Congratulations to all of us celebratingSindhi Culture Day.
It is symbolic, proof of a great tradition of peace. The land of Shah Abdul Latif Bhittai has much to teach Pakistan about living together with love & humility worrying about human misery rather than religious extremes.”
